com.linkedin.cubert.functions

Class FunctionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedin.cubert.functions.FunctionTree

  • public class FunctionTree
extends Object
    Parses, constructs and executes the function tree.

    This class can maintain multiple function trees (added via the addFunctionTree method). This method parses the JSON specification and builds a runtime representation of the function tree. This method may throw a PreconditionException if any inconsistency is found in the JSON.

    The output type for each function tree can be retrieved using the getType method.

    The function tree can be evaluation using the evalTree method. Before calling this method, the input tuple must be assigned to the tree using the attachTuple method.
